actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-1308.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: Resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on S. 821.  A bill to improve the quality of juvenile justice in the United States and to provide a comprehensive, coordinated approach to the problems of juvenile delinquency.

summary.text: Provides that immediately upon the adoption of this resolution, clause 2, rule XXVIII to the contrary notwithstanding, it shall be in order to consider the conference report on the bill (S. 821) to improve the quality of juvenile justice in the United States and to provide a comprehensive, coordinated approach to the problems of juvenile delinquency.

titles.title: Resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on S. 821.  A bill to improve the quality of juvenile justice in the United States and to provide a comprehensive, coordinated approach to the problems of juvenile delinquency.
